edu.citadel.cprl.ast.Statement

Packages that use Statement
Package Description
edu.citadel.cprl  
edu.citadel.cprl.ast  

  • Uses of Statement in edu.citadel.cprl

    Methods in edu.citadel.cprl that return Statement
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Statement Parser.parseStatement()
    Parse the following grammar rule:
    statement = assignmentStmt | ifStmt | loopStmt | exitStmt | readStmt | writeStmt | writelnStmt | procedureCallStmt | returnStmt .
    Methods in edu.citadel.cprl that return types with arguments of type Statement
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.List<Statement> Parser.parseStatements()
    Parse the following grammar rule:
    statements = ( statement )* .

    Returns the list of "then" statements for this elsif part.
